Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict that the Dallas Mavericks do not stand a chance against the Cleveland Cavaliers in the upcoming match on January 4, 2025.
Dallas Mavericks lost Luka Doncic to injury during a Christmas Day game against Minnesota.
The Mavericks have had a rough start but are still holding strong in fifth place in the Western Conference.
Cleveland Cavaliers are leading the Eastern Conference and have a streak of eight straight wins ahead of the meeting with Dallas.
Cleveland has secured three victories in their tour of the West, beating Denver, Golden State, and the Los Angeles Lakers.
